description:
Reentrancy in SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchImpl(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#712-734):
	External calls:
	- (seqMessageIndex,beforeAcc,delayedAcc,acc) = bridge.enqueueSequencerMessage(dataHash,afterDelayedMessagesRead,prevMessageCount,newMessageCount) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#725-727)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDelayedMessagesRead = afterDelayedMessagesRead (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#729)
	SequencerInbox.totalDelayedMessagesRead (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#67) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- SequencerInbox._setBufferConfig(BufferConfig) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#765-785)
	- SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchFromBlobsImpl(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#411-454)
	- SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchFromCalldataImpl(uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#456-495)
	- SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchImpl(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#712-734)
	- SequencerInbox.delayProofImpl(uint256,DelayProof) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#533-553)
	- SequencerInbox.forceInclusion(uint256,uint8,uint64[2],uint256,address,bytes32) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#270-327)
	- SequencerInbox.isDelayProofRequired(uint256) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#555-562)
	- SequencerInbox.totalDelayedMessagesRead (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#67)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchImpl(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L712-L734):
	External calls:
	- [(seqMessageIndex,beforeAcc,delayedAcc,acc) = bridge.enqueueSequencerMessage(dataHash,afterDelayedMessagesRead,prevMessageCount,newMessageCount)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L725-L727)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [totalDelayedMessagesRead = afterDelayedMessagesRead](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L729)
	[SequencerInbox.totalDelayedMessagesRead](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L67) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [SequencerInbox._setBufferConfig(BufferConfig)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L765-L785)
	- [SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchFromBlobsImpl(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L411-L454)
	- [SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchFromCalldataImpl(uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L456-L495)
	- [SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchImpl(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L712-L734)
	- [SequencerInbox.delayProofImpl(uint256,DelayProof)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L533-L553)
	- [SequencerInbox.forceInclusion(uint256,uint8,uint64[2],uint256,address,bytes32)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L270-L327)
	- [SequencerInbox.isDelayProofRequired(uint256)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L555-L562)
	- [SequencerInbox.totalDelayedMessagesRead](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L67)
